item.title: Quick Tips - Early Returns
item.author: dev3141592@gmail.com (abschill)
item.description: A good tip to keep in mind when programming is minimizing your use of else statements. When possible, exit the function context earlier given a value that establishes the given return, rather than reflecting that with an else statement to check for something else.
